verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%><S%H559>saying,<s%>
<S%H2088>This<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> shall be to you the <S%H7218>beginning<s%> of <S%H2320>months:<s%> it shall be the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> of the <S%H8141>year<s%> to you.

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> you to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> In the <S%H6218>tenth<s%> day of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> they shall <S%H3947>take<s%> to them every <S%H376>man<s%> a <S%H7716>lamb,<s%> according to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> a <S%H7716>lamb<s%> for an <S%H1004>house:<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H1004>household<s%> be too <S%H4591>little<s%> for the <S%H7716>lamb,<s%> let him and his <S%H7934>neighbor<s%> <S%H7138>next<s%> to his <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> it according to the <S%H4373>number<s%> of the <S%H5315>souls;<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6310>according<s%> to his <S%H400>eating<s%> shall make your <S%H3699>count<s%> for the <S%H7716>lamb.<s%>

Your <S%H7716>lamb<s%> shall be <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>blemish,<s%> a <S%H2145>male<s%> of the <S%H1121>first<s%> <S%H8141>year:<s%> you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> it out from the <S%H3532>sheep,<s%> or from the <S%H5795>goats:<s%>

And you shall <S%H4931>keep<s%> it up <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2088>same<s%> <S%H2320>month:<s%> and the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H7819>kill<s%> it in the <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

And they shall <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and <S%H5414>strike<s%> it <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> side <S%H4201>posts<s%> and <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H4947>upper<s%> <S%H4947>door<s%> <S%H4947>post<s%> of the <S%H1004>houses,<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it.

And they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in that <S%H3915>night,<s%> <S%H6748>roast<s%> with <S%H784>fire,<s%> and <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> bread; and with <S%H4844>bitter<s%> herbs they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it.

<S%H398>Eat<s%> not of it <S%H4995>raw,<s%> nor <S%H1310>sodden<s%> at all with <S%H4325>water,<s%> but <S%H6748>roast<s%> with <S%H784>fire;<s%> his <S%H7218>head<s%> with his <S%H3767>legs,<s%> and with the <S%H7130>entrails<s%> thereof.

And you shall let <S%H3808>nothing<s%> of it <S%H3498>remain<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H1242>morning;<s%> and that which <S%H3498>remains<s%> of it <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H1242>morning<s%> you shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

And <S%H3602>thus<s%> shall you <S%H398>eat<s%> it; with your <S%H4975>loins<s%> <S%H2296>girded,<s%> your <S%H5275>shoes<s%> on your <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and your <S%H4731>staff<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it in <S%H2649>haste:<s%> it is the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H6453>passover.<s%>

For I will <S%H5674>pass<s%> through the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3915>night,<s%> and will <S%H5221>smite<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> both <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast;<s%> and against <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H430>gods<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> I will <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H8201>judgment:<s%> I am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be to you for a <S%H226>token<s%> on the <S%H1004>houses<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> you are: and when I <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H1818>blood,<s%> I will <S%H6452>pass<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> you, and the <S%H5063>plague<s%> shall not be on you to <S%H4889>destroy<s%> you, when I <S%H5221>smite<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be to you for a <S%H2146>memorial;<s%> and you shall <S%H2287>keep<s%> it a <S%H2282>feast<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations;<s%> you shall <S%H2287>keep<s%> it a <S%H2287>feast<s%> by an <S%H2708>ordinance<s%> for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>

<S%H7651>Seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall you <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> bread; <S%H389>even<s%> the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> you shall <S%H7673>put<s%> away <S%H7603>leaven<s%> out of your <S%H1004>houses:<s%> for <S%H3605>whoever<s%> <S%H398>eats<s%> <S%H2557>leavened<s%> bread from the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> that <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> off from <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> there shall be an <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation,<s%> and in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> there shall be an <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation<s%> to you; <S%H3808>no<s%> manner of <S%H4399>work<s%> shall be <S%H6213>done<s%> in them, <S%H389>save<s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5315>man<s%> must <S%H398>eat,<s%> that <S%H905>only<s%> may be <S%H6213>done<s%> of you.

And you shall <S%H8104>observe<s%> the feast of <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> bread; for in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2088>selfsame<s%> <S%H6106><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> have I <S%H3318>brought<s%> your <S%H6635>armies<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> therefore shall you <S%H8104>observe<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> in your <S%H1755>generations<s%> by an <S%H2708>ordinance<s%> for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>

In the <S%H7223>first<s%> month, on the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month<s%> at <S%H6153>even,<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> bread, <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H259>one<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month<s%> at even.

<S%H7651>Seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall there be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7603>leaven<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> in your <S%H1004>houses:<s%> for whoever <S%H398>eats<s%> that which is <S%H2557>leavened,<s%> even that <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> off from the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> whether he be a <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> or <S%H249>born<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>
You shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3808>nothing<s%> <S%H2557>leavened;<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H4186>habitations<s%> shall you <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> bread.

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H4900>Draw<s%> out and <S%H3947>take<s%> you a <S%H6629>lamb<s%> according to your <S%H4940>families,<s%> and <S%H7819>kill<s%> the <S%H6453>passover.<s%>

And you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H92>bunch<s%> of <S%H231>hyssop,<s%> and <S%H2881>dip<s%> it in the <S%H1818>blood<s%> that is in the <S%H5592>basin,<s%> and <S%H5060>strike<s%> the <S%H4947>lintel<s%> and the <S%H8147>two<s%> side <S%H4201>posts<s%> with the <S%H1818>blood<s%> that is in the <S%H5592>basin;<s%> and <S%H3808>none<s%> of you shall <S%H3318>go<s%> out at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of his <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H1242>morning.<s%>

For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H5674>pass<s%> through to <S%H5062>smite<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians;<s%> and when he <S%H7200>sees<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> on the <S%H4947>lintel,<s%> and <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> side <S%H4201>posts,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H6452>pass<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H6607>door,<s%> and will not <S%H5414>suffer<s%> the <S%H7843>destroyer<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> in to your <S%H1004>houses<s%> to <S%H5062>smite<s%> you.
And you shall <S%H8104>observe<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> for an <S%H2706>ordinance<s%> to you and to your <S%H1121>sons<s%> for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, <S%H3588>when<s%> you be <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H5414>give<s%> you, according as he has <S%H1696>promised,<s%> that you shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5656>service.<s%>
And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, <S%H3588>when<s%> your <S%H1121>children<s%> shall <S%H559>say<s%> to you, <S%H4100>What<s%> mean you by <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5656>service?<s%>

That you shall <S%H559>say,<s%> It is the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H6453>passover,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H6452>passed<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> when he <S%H5062>smote<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> and <S%H5337>delivered<s%> our <S%H1004>houses.<s%> And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6915>bowed<s%> the head and <S%H7812>worshipped.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> away, and <S%H6213>did<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> they.

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, that at <S%H2677>midnight<s%> <S%H3915><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> from the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> that <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> his <S%H3678>throne<s%> to the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of the <S%H7628>captive<s%> that was in the <S%H1004>dungeon;<s%> <S%H953><s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H929>cattle.<s%>

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H6965>rose<s%> up in the <S%H3915>night,<s%> he, and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians;<s%> and there was a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6818>cry<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> for there was not a <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> there was not one <S%H4191>dead.<s%>

And he <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> by <S%H3915>night,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6965>Rise<s%> up, and <S%H3318>get<s%> you <S%H3318>forth<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> my <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H1571>both<s%> you and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and <S%H3212>go,<s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> as you have <S%H1696>said.<s%>
<S%H1571>Also<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> your <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and your <S%H1241>herds,<s%> as you have <S%H1696>said,<s%> and be <S%H3212>gone;<s%> and <S%H1288>bless<s%> me <S%H1571>also.<s%>

And the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> were <S%H2388>urgent<s%> on the <S%H5971>people,<s%> that they might <S%H7971>send<s%> them out of the <S%H776>land<s%> in <S%H4422>haste;<s%> for they <S%H559>said,<s%> We be <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4191>dead<s%> men.

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5375>took<s%> their <S%H1217>dough<s%> <S%H2962>before<s%> it was <S%H2557>leavened,<s%> their kneading <S%H4863>troughs<s%> being <S%H6887>bound<s%> up in their <S%H8071>clothes<s%> on their <S%H7926>shoulders.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses;<s%> and they <S%H7592>borrowed<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H8071>raiment:<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> so that they <S%H7592>lent<s%> to them such things as they required. And they <S%H5337>spoiled<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H7486>Rameses<s%> to <S%H5523>Succoth,<s%> about <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> on <S%H7273>foot<s%> that were <S%H1397>men,<s%> <S%H905>beside<s%> <S%H2945>children.<s%>

And a <S%H6154>mixed<s%> <S%H7227>multitude<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up <S%H1571>also<s%> with them; and <S%H6629>flocks,<s%> and <S%H1241>herds,<s%> even <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3515>much<s%> <S%H4735>cattle.<s%>

And they <S%H644>baked<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H5692>cakes<s%> of the <S%H1217>dough<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H3318>brought<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> for it was not <S%H2557>leavened;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they were <S%H1644>thrust<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H4102>tarry,<s%> <S%H1571>neither<s%> <S%H3808><s%> had they <S%H6213>prepared<s%> for <S%H1992>themselves<s%> any <S%H6720>victual.<s%>

Now the <S%H4186>sojourning<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> was <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass at the <S%H7093>end<s%> of the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> even the <S%H2088>selfsame<s%> <S%H6106><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, that <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6635>hosts<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

It is a <S%H3915>night<s%> to be much <S%H8107>observed<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for <S%H3318>bringing<s%> them out from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> is that <S%H3915>night<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to be <S%H8107>observed<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in their <S%H1755>generations.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H2063>This<s%> is the <S%H2708>ordinance<s%> of the <S%H6453>passover:<s%> There shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1121>stranger<s%> <S%H5235><s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> thereof:

But <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H5650>servant<s%> that is <S%H4736>bought<s%> for <S%H3701>money,<s%> when you have <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> him, <S%H227>then<s%> shall he <S%H398>eat<s%> thereof.
A <S%H8453>foreigner<s%> and an <S%H7916>hired<s%> <S%H7916>servant<s%> shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> thereof.

In <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> shall it be <S%H398>eaten;<s%> you shall not <S%H3318>carry<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> ought of the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H2351>abroad<s%> out of the <S%H1004>house;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall you <S%H7665>break<s%> a <S%H6106>bone<s%> thereof.
<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H6213>keep<s%> it.

And <S%H3588>when<s%> a <S%H1616>stranger<s%> shall <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> with you, and will <S%H6213>keep<s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> let <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H2145>males<s%> be <S%H4135>circumcised,<s%> and <S%H227>then<s%> let him <S%H7126>come<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> and <S%H6213>keep<s%> it; and he shall be as one that is <S%H249>born<s%> in the <S%H776>land:<s%> for <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> person shall <S%H398>eat<s%> thereof.
<S%H259>One<s%> <S%H8451>law<s%> shall be to him that is home <S%H249>born,<s%> and to the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that <S%H1481>sojournes<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> you.

Thus <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> they.

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass the <S%H2088>selfsame<s%> <S%H6106><s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> did <S%H3318>bring<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> by their <S%H6635>armies.<s%>
